document.docAuthor: Ebert, David A., Wintner, Sabine P. & Kyne, Peter M.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of South Africa

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of South Africa

taxonomicName.baseAuthorityName: Barbosa du Bocage & de Brito Capello
taxonomicName.emphasis: Centroselachus crepidater ( Barbosa du Bocage & de Brito Capello, 1864 )

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Centrophorus crepidater
Barbosa du Bocage & de Brito Capello, 1864: 262
, fig. 3. Holotype (unique): MB t.112(49) [destroyed in fire in 1978]. Denticles from holotype in MCZ 89511 . Type locality: [Nossos mares] Portugal , northeastern Atlantic.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Local synonymy :
Centroscymnus crepidater :
Compagno et al ., 1989: 32
, pl.;
Compagno et al ., 1991: 58
;
Ebert et al ., 1992: 604
; Compagno, 1999: 115 .
Centroselachus crepidater
:
Compagno et al ., 2005
: 113
, fig., pl. 10;

South Africa voucher material
: SAIAB 25724, SAIAB 26278, SAIAB 26279, SAIAB 26280, SAIAB 26281, SAIAB 26337, SAIAB 27599, SAIAB 27600, SAIAB 27602.

South Africa distribution
: The Orange River (NC) to Cape Agulhas (WC), but not yet confirmed from the EC or KZN.

Remarks : First reported in South African waters by
Compagno et al . (1989)
and
Compagno et al . (1991)
; previous southern African records were from off Namibia (
Bass et al ., 1976
;
Bass et al ., 1986
). Although the species has not been reported from the EC or KZN, it is quite common east of South Africa along the Madagascar Ridge. A somewhat common species along the upper continental slope,
C. crepidater
appears to be a faunal associate of
C. coelolepis
since both species are frequently collected together (
Compagno et al ., 1991
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Scymnodalatias Garrick, 1956: 564
. Type species:
Scymnodon sherwoodi Archey, 1921
by original designation (also monotypic).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Scymnodalatias albicauda
Taniuchi & Garrick, 1986: 120
, figs. 1–2. Holotype : FUMT-P 197 . Type locality: South Indian Ocean , 45°S , 92°E .

Local synonymy :
Scymnodalatias albicauda :
Compagno et al ., 2005
: 114
, fig., pl. 11; Ebert, 2013: 96 , fig. 135;
Ebert et al ., 2013
a: 153, fig., pl. 14; Ebert & Mostada, 2013: 45, fig.; Ebert & Dando, 2014: 87 , fig.; Ebert, 2015: 93 , fig. 110; Ebert & Mostada, 2015: 39, fig.; Ebert & van Hees, 2015: 144 ; Weigmann, 2016: 899 .

South Africa distribution
:
Southwest of South Africa ( Ebert, 2013 , 2015 ). Presence in South African waters requires confirmation
.

Remarks : Reported from a few scattered records southwest of South Africa , there are no voucher specimens in museum collections confirming its presence in South African waters ( Ebert, 2013 ; 2015 ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Somniosus Lesueur, 1818: 222
. Type species:
Somniosus brevipinna , Lesueur, 1818
by monotypy; synonym of
Somniosus microcephalus ( Bloch & Schneider, 1801 )
.
